text_block_list.text: The day after the haskaps arrived, I saw Hokko Tarumae. I approached her to tell her that the farmer was pleased to hear about her―

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Ummm…… Why does it always go wrong? Is it that the appeal of Tomakomai doesn't mesh well with the pure cute character or something?

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Should I rethink our direction as a locodol? Should we be more like Tomakomai, rocking out?

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Or more, energetic type? Maybe try making a Tomakomai gag… Ummm, but if I'm aiming for mass popularity, the current cute style is best……

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Instead of reviewing the character, would it be better to change the time of day? I can't do late night…… so morning? Maybe with a morning greeting, or―

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: ………… Aaah!?

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Did you hear that!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: ……ah!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: No…… no! I think I had a gap too, but it's just that… can you please don't tell anyone else about it?

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: I was reflecting on the fact that I was playing pure cute in my calculations!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Yes, it's a trade secret, so to speak! Leakage of information is considered obstruction of business!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Please ……! …… haaaa～ ……

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: …… Oh, you…… are the one who came to the street show the other day, right?

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Of course! It's only natural for us as locodol to remember our customers faces!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Yes……! Would you mind sharing your thoughts on it if you'd like? I'd love to use it for reference!
And so, in an unexpected turn of events, she caught me―

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: ―hmmm, hmmm, hmmm! Well, thank you for your valuable input ……!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Maybe the…… tasting is pretty good. It seemed like a lot of people enjoyed the songs, and more new songs―.
A notepad that had been repeatedly written on and erased, and was now exhausted. The sight of her frantically running her pen over it left a strong impression on me.
…… a few days later. A mock race was held, and when I went to watch, I saw Hokko Tarumae running.

text_block_list.name: Event Commentator
text_block_list.text: Less than 200 meters to go, running away, leading by 3 length!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: ―……Ugh!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: (I've got to catch up soon……! But, my legs are too heavy…… I can't reach ………)

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: U…… Uaaaaaah!
She ran desperately to the finish line, but…… the result was 11th place.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: ……～～～! This is no time to be downhearted!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: I am the star of Tomakomai!
And so from that day forward―

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Ha, ha, ha!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: …… Not yet!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Good morning! I'm locodol from Tomakomai♪ Let's do our best today everyone～!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: …… DI, did you not hear me? Let's do our best～!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: …… phew, ha!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Oh, I can't do it anymore…… Not! ―One more time!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Good morning……… I'm going to do a street show next time♪ Please look forward to it!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: ………Nobody, no one stop! ……Ugh, Don't be discouraged, don't be discouraged.
She is now seen running in the evenings, and in the mornings she is busy with locodol activities in all kinds of places.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Ha, ha, ha! ……! ―Time ……!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: It's getting slower……

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: I don't know why, but the more I run, the more I feel like I'm getting worse and worse……

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: …… ugh ……! I'm not going to lose!
Even from the sidelines, I can tell that she is straining herself. Is there anything I can do to give them a break?
However, I don't know much about her yet. The one thing I do know that she seems to like for sure is―
